about_the_game:
Discover the world of the Lamplighters League and the Tower at the End of the World in this digital artbook including over 200 pages of the game’s unique art direction and inspirations behind its iconic locations and unforgettable agents.

To access the The Lamplighters League Digital Artbook, go to your Steam main folder; by default the path is:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\LamplightersLeague\Artbook

You will find the file ""LamplightersLeague_Artbook.pdf"" in this folder."
detailed_description:
Discover the world of the Lamplighters League and the Tower at the End of the World in this digital artbook including over 200 pages of the game’s unique art direction and inspirations behind its iconic locations and unforgettable agents.

To access the The Lamplighters League Digital Artbook, go to your Steam main folder; by default the path is:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\LamplightersLeague\Artbook

You will find the file ""LamplightersLeague_Artbook.pdf"" in this folder."
